current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To provide for the conveyance of certain National Forest System land in the State of Louisiana.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Kisatchie National Forest Land Conveyance Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Kisatchie National Forest Land Conveyance Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
finds that it is in the public interest to authorize the conveyance of certain Federal
			 land in
			 the Kisatchie National Forest in the State of Louisiana for market value
			 consideration.

text.#text: In this Act:

quote.#tail: means Collins Camp Properties, Inc., a corporation incorporated under the laws of the State.
